languages.text: [Сделать гордое и торжественное лицо] "Разве я достиг{mf||ла} бы славы, жалуясь на каждую неурядицу? Нет! Я {mf|шел|шла} вперед, несмотря на лишения! И вы идите — мы запомним ваши имена!"

[Gaze proudly and solemnly at the crowd] "Would I have achieved glory if I had complained about every hardship along my path? No! I pressed ever onward in spite of all the adversity! So must you — and we will remember your names for it!"
languages.original_text: [Сделать гордое и торжественное лицо] "Разве я достиг{mf||ла} бы славы, жалуясь на каждую неурядицу? Нет! Я {mf|шел|шла} вперед, несмотря на лишения! И вы идите — мы запомним ваши имена!"

languages.text: [Die Menge stolz und feierlich betrachten] "Hätte ich es zu Ruhm gebracht, wenn ich mich über jedes Hindernis auf meinem Weg beklagt hätte? Nein! Ich bin trotzt aller Widrigkeiten immer weitergegangen! Das müsst auch Ihr tun ... und wir werden uns dafür Eurer Namen erinnern!"
languages.original_text: [Gaze proudly and solemnly at the crowd] "Would I have achieved glory if I had complained about every hardship along my path? No! I pressed ever onward in spite of all the adversity! So must you — and we will remember your names for it!"

traits.locale_text: [Die Menge stolz und feierlich betrachten] "Hätte ich es zu Ruhm gebracht, wenn ich mich über jedes Hindernis auf meinem Weg beklagt hätte? Nein! Ich bin trotzt aller Widrigkeiten immer weitergegangen! Das müsst auch Ihr tun ... und wir werden uns dafür Eurer Namen erinnern!"

languages.text: [Lancer un regard fier et solennel à la foule] « Aurais-je connu la gloire si je m'étais {mf|plaint|plainte} de toutes les vicissitudes qu'il m'a fallu endurer ? Jamais ! Je n'ai jamais baissé les bras face à l'adversité ! Faites-en autant et vos noms resteront gravés dans nos mémoires ! »
languages.original_text: [Gaze proudly and solemnly at the crowd] "Would I have achieved glory if I had complained about every hardship along my path? No! I pressed ever onward in spite of all the adversity! So must you — and we will remember your names for it!"

traits.locale_text: [Lancer un regard fier et solennel à la foule] « Aurais-je connu la gloire si je m'étais {m|plaint|plainte} de toutes les vicissitudes qu'il m'a fallu endurer ? Jamais ! Je n'ai jamais baissé les bras face à l'adversité ! Faites-en autant et vos noms resteront gravés dans nos mémoires ! »

languages.text: [Observar al gentío con orgullo y solemnidad] «¿Habría alcanzado yo la gloria de haberme dedicado a protestar por todas las penurias que he padecido? ¡No! ¡Me mantuve firme contra toda adversidad! Lo mismo debéis hacer vosotros, ¡y vuestros nombres serán recordados por ello!».
languages.original_text: [Gaze proudly and solemnly at the crowd] "Would I have achieved glory if I had complained about every hardship along my path? No! I pressed ever onward in spite of all the adversity! So must you — and we will remember your names for it!"

traits.locale_text: [Observar al gentío con orgullo y solemnidad] «¿Habría alcanzado yo la gloria de haberme dedicado a protestar por todas las penurias que he padecido? ¡No! ¡Me mantuve firme contra toda adversidad! Lo mismo debéis hacer vosotros, ¡y vuestros nombres serán recordados por ello!».

languages.text: [誇り高く、かつ厳かな目で群衆を見つめる]「もしも私が、自らの行く手に現れるあらゆる苦難に不平を言っていたならば、栄光を手にすることができただろうか？否！いかなる逆境にも負けず、前へ前へと突き進んだのだ！諸君らもそうあらねばならぬ。そして、それを評価して、諸君らの名前を記憶しよう！」
languages.original_text: [Gaze proudly and solemnly at the crowd] "Would I have achieved glory if I had complained about every hardship along my path? No! I pressed ever onward in spite of all the adversity! So must you — and we will remember your names for it!"

traits.locale_text: [誇り高く、かつ厳かな目で群衆を見つめる]「もしも私が、自らの行く手に現れるあらゆる苦難に不平を言っていたならば、栄光を手にすることができただろうか？否！いかなる逆境にも負けず、前へ前へと突き進んだのだ！諸君らもそうあらねばならぬ。そして、それを評価して、諸君らの名前を記憶しよう！」

languages.text: [自豪而严肃地注视着人群]“在我的人生道路上，如果我每遇到一次障碍，我就抱怨一次，那我还能得到荣耀吗？不可能！尽管逆境重重，可我还是坚持向前！你们也必须这么做！只要这样，我们也会记住你们的名字！”
languages.original_text: [Gaze proudly and solemnly at the crowd] "Would I have achieved glory if I had complained about every hardship along my path? No! I pressed ever onward in spite of all the adversity! So must you — and we will remember your names for it!"

traits.locale_text: [自豪而严肃地注视着人群]“在我的人生道路上，如果我每遇到一次障碍，我就抱怨一次，那我还能得到荣耀吗？不可能！尽管逆境重重，可我还是坚持向前！你们也必须这么做！只要这样，我们也会记住你们的名字！”

languages.text: [Kalabalığa gururla ve vakurlukla bak] "Yoluma çıkan her bir zorluktan şikâyet etseydim başarıya erişebilir miydim? Hayır! Tüm talihsizliklere rağmen kararlılığımdan ödün vermeden devam ettim! Siz de devam etmelisiniz ki isimleriniz hafızalardan silinmesin!"
languages.original_text: [Gaze proudly and solemnly at the crowd] "Would I have achieved glory if I had complained about every hardship along my path? No! I pressed ever onward in spite of all the adversity! So must you — and we will remember your names for it!"
